League 1
ASSE - Monaco: the official teams!
On behalf of the 12th day of Ligue 1, ASSE receives Geoffroy-Guichard AS Monaco. Discover the official compositions of the two teams!
03 Nov 2019, 19:00 by Antoine Chirat



Harold MoukoudiClub previous: Le HavreTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Jean-Eudes Aholou Previous club: AS MonacoTransfer fee: none (ready) Icon Sport



Alpha SissokoClub previous: ClermontTransfer allowance: noneIcon Sport



Yohan CabayeClub previous: without clubTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Sergi PalenciaClub previous: FC BarcelonaTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Miguel TraucoClub previous: FlamengoTransfer allowance: 1 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Denis BouangaClub previous: N√Æmes OlympiqueTransfer fee: ‚Ç¨ 4.5 M Icon Sport



Ryad BoudebouzClub previous: Betis SevillaTransfer allowance: 3.5 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Zaydou Youssouf Previous club: Girondins de BordeauxTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport

ASSE: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




In difficulty at the beginning of the season, ASSE and AS Monaco breathe a little more in recent weeks before facing off tonight at Geoffroy-Guichard on behalf of the 12th day of Ligue 1. championship (14th and 15th with 15 points), St√©phanois and Monegasques will absolutely win tonight to take the advantage over the other and return to the first part of the table. In case of victories, they will then point to 8th place in the standings, just ahead of Brest and OL.




Official teams




Wissam Ben Yedder + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport


ASSE: Ruffier, Saliba, Kolodziejczak, Silva, Debuchy, Fofana, Boudebouz, Youssouf, Cabaye, Bouanga, Hamouma
AS Monaco: Lecomte, Jemerson, Glik, Badiashile, Henrichs, Golovin, Silva, Ben Yedder, Martins, Balde, Dias
